name: LineHandleAdornment
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  A line-shaped handle that can be adorned to a Class.BasePart.
description: |
  LineHandleAdornment is a line-shaped handle that can be adorned to a
  Class.BasePart. This line starts at the center of the adornment's
  Class.LineHandleAdornment.CFrame|CFrame (offset by its
  Class.LineHandleAdornment.SizeRelativeOffset|SizeRelativeOffset) and is
  oriented along its Class.LineHandleAdornment.CFrame|CFrame. If parented to a
  player's Class.PlayerGui or the Class.CoreGui, handles can listen to input
  events for purposes such as making dragger tools.
